New Records: Andrew Wiggins scored a team-high 24 points, including 18 in the third quarter, with a season-high four steals.
Dennis Schr√∂der recorded a personal-best 17 points and nine assists as a Warrior.
Lindy Waters III made a season-high four 3-pointers and scored 16 points.
Key Match Events: Lindy Waters III scored eight straight points in the second quarter, including two 3-pointers, to regain momentum.
Jonathan Kuminga exited the game with a right ankle sprain after attempting a block.
Andrew Wiggins made his first six field goal attempts in the third quarter, scoring 18 points.
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors improved to 10-8 at home this season and have won two of their last three games at Chase Center.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors have won two straight games for the first time since November 20-22.
The team leads the league in clutch games with 22 such games this season.
Others: The Warriors have a 2-1 season series lead over the Grizzlies, with the final meeting on April 1.
